Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Interfaces
  • Deprecated Fields
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    org.gradle.api.tasks.CompatibilityAdapterForTaskInputs
    The interface is only here to allow plugins built against Gradle 2.x to run and it will be removed in Gradle 5.0.
    org.gradle.api.tasks.CompatibilityAdapterForTaskOutputs
    The interface is only here to allow plugins built against Gradle 2.x to run and it will be removed in Gradle 5.0.
  • Deprecated Fields 
    Field and Description
    org.gradle.api.plugins.JavaPlugin.COMPILE_CONFIGURATION_NAME
    Users should prefer JavaPlugin.API_CONFIGURATION_NAME or JavaPlugin.IMPLEMENTATION_CONFIGURATION_NAME.
    org.gradle.api.plugins.JavaPlugin.RUNTIME_CONFIGURATION_NAME
    Consumers should use JavaPlugin.RUNTIME_ELEMENTS_CONFIGURATION_NAME instead.
    org.gradle.api.plugins.JavaPlugin.TEST_RUNTIME_CONFIGURATION_NAME
    Use JavaPlugin.TEST_RUNTIME_CLASSPATH_CONFIGURATION_NAME instead.
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    org.gradle.api.plugins.JavaBasePlugin.configureForSourceSet(SourceSet, AbstractCompile)
    org.gradle.api.tasks.TaskInputFilePropertyBuilder.dir(Object)
    Use TaskInputs.dir(Object) directly instead.
    org.gradle.api.tasks.TaskOutputFilePropertyBuilder.dir(Object)
    Use TaskOutputs.dir(Object) instead.
    org.gradle.api.tasks.TaskInputFilePropertyBuilder.file(Object)
    Use TaskInputs.file(Object) directly instead.
    org.gradle.api.tasks.TaskOutputFilePropertyBuilder.file(Object)
    Use TaskOutputs.file(Object) instead.
    org.gradle.api.tasks.TaskInputFilePropertyBuilder.files(Object...)
    Use TaskInputs.files(Object...) directly instead.
    org.gradle.api.tasks.TaskOutputFilePropertyBuilder.files(Object...)
    Use TaskOutputs.files(Object...) instead.
    org.gradle.api.plugins.quality.JDepend.getClassesDir()
    Replaced by JDepend.getClassesDirs().
    org.gradle.api.tasks.SourceSetOutput.getClassesDir()
    Use SourceSetOutput.getClassesDirs() or SourceDirectorySet.getOutputDir()
    org.gradle.tooling.model.idea.IdeaModuleDependency.getDependencyModule()
    org.gradle.api.tasks.TaskInputFilePropertyBuilder.getFiles()
    Use TaskInputs.getFiles() directly instead.
    org.gradle.api.tasks.TaskOutputFilePropertyBuilder.getFiles()
    Use TaskOutputs.getFiles() instead.
    org.gradle.api.tasks.TaskInputFilePropertyBuilder.getHasInputs()
    Use TaskInputs.getHasInputs() directly instead.
    org.gradle.api.tasks.TaskOutputFilePropertyBuilder.getHasOutput()
    Use TaskOutputs.getHasOutput() instead.
    org.gradle.api.tasks.TaskInputFilePropertyBuilder.getHasSourceFiles()
    Use TaskInputs.getHasSourceFiles() directly instead.
    org.gradle.api.tasks.TaskInputFilePropertyBuilder.getProperties()
    Use TaskInputs.getProperties() directly instead.
    org.gradle.api.tasks.TaskInputFilePropertyBuilder.getSourceFiles()
    Use TaskInputs.getSourceFiles() directly instead.
    org.gradle.api.tasks.compile.CompileOptions.getSourcepath()
    See: #setSourcePath(FileCollection) for deprecation reason.
    org.gradle.tooling.model.eclipse.EclipseProjectDependency.getTargetProject()
    org.gradle.api.tasks.testing.Test.getTestClassesDir()
    Use Test.getTestClassesDirs().
    org.gradle.StartParameter.isTaskOutputCacheEnabled()
    Use StartParameter.isBuildCacheEnabled()
    org.gradle.api.Task.leftShift(Closure)
    Use Task.doLast(Closure action)
    org.gradle.plugins.ide.idea.IdeaPlugin.performPostEvaluationActions()
    org.gradle.plugins.ide.eclipse.EclipsePlugin.performPostEvaluationActions()
    org.gradle.api.tasks.TaskInputFilePropertyBuilder.properties(Map)
    Use TaskInputs.properties(Map) directly instead.
    org.gradle.api.tasks.TaskInputFilePropertyBuilder.property(String, Object)
    Use TaskInputs.property(String, Object) directly instead.
    org.gradle.api.plugins.quality.JDepend.setClassesDir(File)
    Replaced by JDepend.getClassesDirs().
    org.gradle.api.tasks.SourceSetOutput.setClassesDir(File)
    Set the output directory for the particular SourceDirectorySet
    org.gradle.api.tasks.SourceSetOutput.setClassesDir(Object)
    Set the output directory for the particular SourceDirectorySet
    org.gradle.api.reporting.ConfigurableReport.setDestination(Object)
    Replaced by ConfigurableReport.setDestination(java.io.File) and ConfigurableReport.setDestination(org.gradle.api.provider.Provider).
    org.gradle.api.tasks.compile.CompileOptions.setSourcepath(FileCollection)
    you can still set sourcepath using #setCompilerArgs(), but some compile tasks (e.g. JavaCompile) will throw an exception if a sourcepath argument is set. Given the rich semantics of the SourceTask.setSource(Object) method, users really shouldn't need to set the sourcepath.
    org.gradle.StartParameter.setTaskOutputCacheEnabled(boolean)
    Use StartParameter.setBuildCacheEnabled(boolean)
    org.gradle.api.tasks.testing.Test.setTestClassesDir(File)
    Use Test.setTestClassesDirs(FileCollection).
    org.gradle.api.tasks.TaskOutputFilePropertyBuilder.upToDateWhen(Closure)
    Use TaskOutputs.upToDateWhen(Closure) instead.
    org.gradle.api.tasks.TaskOutputFilePropertyBuilder.upToDateWhen(Spec)
    Use TaskOutputs.upToDateWhen(Spec) instead.
